location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 48 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus refers to his despatch no. 44 and forwards a copy of a letter (ff 16v-17) from Captain Robert Taylor acknowledging receipts of Stannus's communication and expressing his intention of complying with his suggestions on the subject of the Imam of Muscat's squadron.
